data.event: It was created in 1963 from an eastern portion of the Ñuñoa commune.

event.title: 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, La Reina spans

data.event: According to the 2002 census of the National Statistics Institute, La Reina spans an area of 23.4 km2 (9 sq mi) and has 96,762 inhabitants (44,293 men and 52,469 women), making the commune an entirely urban area.
The population grew by 4.7% (4,352 persons) between the 1992 and 2002 censuses.
